meanings.definition: A device used to separate solids from a liquid by causing the solids to form crystals.
meanings.sent1: The crystallizers in the lab helped separate the sugar crystals from the syrup.
meanings.sent2: The factory installed new crystallizers to extract salt from seawater efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous scientist accidentally turned the crystallizers on, creating a crystal jungle in the room.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like a set of crystallizers, filtering out unnecessary thoughts to focus on the task at hand.
meanings.sent5: The crystallizers hummed softly, turning the murky solution into sparkling crystals.
